result.markdown:
# Введение в R {#rintro}


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.2 ──
✔ ggplot2 3.3.6     ✔ purrr   0.3.4
✔ tibble  3.1.8     ✔ dplyr   1.0.9
✔ tidyr   1.2.0     ✔ stringr 1.4.1
✔ readr   2.1.2     ✔ forcats 0.5.2
── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
theme_set(theme_bw())
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tibble(
  x = rnorm(50, 100, 15),
  y = 8 + 3.4 * x + rnorm(50, 0, 30)
) -> simple_reg
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
simple_reg %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x, y)) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm",
              size = 2,
              se = FALSE,
              color = "red3")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
`geom_smooth()` using formula 'y ~ x'
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](rintro_files/figure-html/simple_reg_figure-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
fit <- lm(y ~ x, simple_reg)
summary(fit)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = y ~ x, data = simple_reg)

Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-60.696 -24.003   2.222  22.772  62.352 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)  19.2731    25.7729   0.748    0.458    
x             3.2549     0.2562  12.704   <2e-16 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 30.96 on 48 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.7708,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.766 
F-statistic: 161.4 on 1 and 48 DF,  p-value: < 2.2e-16
```
:::
:::
